statements.select: SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DepotPosition] Where DepotId = #value# ORDER BY Id ASC
select case when exists( select * from dbo.DepotPosition where DepotPositionid = #DepotPositionid# and DepotId=#depotid# ) then 1 else 0 end
SELECT * FROM DepotPosition WHERE DepotPositionId IN (SELECT DepotPositionId FROM Stock WHERE DepotId=#depotId# AND ProductId=#productId# AND StockQuantity1>0 )

SELECT d.DepotPositionId,d.DepotId,d.Id,d.DepotPositionDescription,s.ProductId AS ProductId ,ISNULL (s.StockQuantity1,0) AS StockQuantity1 FROM DepotPosition d left join stock s on d.DepotPositionId=s.DepotPositionId AND productid=#productId# WHERE d.DepotId=#depotId#
